page.title: 13 INDUSTRY -2 (N.MAIDSTONE)
page.content: were in the development of industry. A new{industrial estate}at Quarry Wood has allowed the development of light industry including engineering and Post Office Supplies storage. Aylesford also hosts the{Royal British {Legion Village}light industries which includes making poppies for Remembrance Day. The small amount of industry has led to a more than proportionate generation of{traffic {and local employment.} There are many{service {industries,}reflecting the highly residential character of the area. Shopping places include the Mid-Kent Shopping Centre.Housing estates boast their parades of convenience shops and many street corners have their small general store.Some larger shops are found nearer the centre. by Sue Laidler
